 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-7-min.png> 	

Wear That Launches in Saudi Arabia 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/25e191b0f959ae20cb2476967e026f4a92942434.gif> 	

Wear That, the region’s first personalized styling platform, officially made its Saudi debut on April 23 with an immersive evening at SIMA Space, Riyadh. The event — themed around "Pink Matcha" — brought together curated looks, style exploration, and community connection. Guests discovered their unique style personalities alongside professional stylists in an atmosphere that merged tech, fashion, and empowerment.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

The Five Dysfunctions of a Team

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=838&user=10620>

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-2-min.png> 	

The Five Dysfunctions of a Team

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=838&user=10620> 	

The Tech Team hosted a powerful workshop around “The Five Dysfunctions of a Team. ”It was more than a learning session , it was a moment of reflection on how we show up as leaders, to drive success across Tech&Data. This strengthens our commitment in ensuring our leaders are not only contributing to outcomes, but also growing, influencing, and leading our teams.
Read More. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=838&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

TRYANO’S ENDLESS BEAUTY FESTIVITIES


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/5c130030db5eef948588d03800350cf846288284.gif> 	

Step into a world of beauty at Tryano, and indulge in expert-led masterclasses, immersive brand activations, skincare services, and exclusive gifts with purchases from top beauty brands. Do not miss out the chance to try Tryano's exclusive Korean Beauty Box — a meticulously curated set featuring a full 6-step Korean skincare routine. Visit Tryano Store, Abu Dhabi to experience the best in beauty.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Our Lights - Logistics Celebration

chunks.text:
Step into a world of beauty at Tryano, and indulge in expert-led masterclasses, immersive brand activations, skincare services, and exclusive gifts with purchases from top beauty brands. Do not miss out the chance to try Tryano's exclusive Korean Beauty Box — a meticulously curated set featuring a full 6-step Korean skincare routine. Visit Tryano Store, Abu Dhabi to experience the best in beauty.


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

Our Lights - Logistics Celebration

Our Logistics team recently hosted a dinner to thank our Warehouse, Last Mile, and Shipping teams for their hard work during Ramadan. As part of our Ramadan Our Lights recognition programme, celebrating our top team performers and energizing them with team-building activities facilitated by L&D.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/64df43b451b585fde7a647bdc85175711462274519.gif> 	
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=839&user=10620>
